data.text: @pkleanthous Hi! We apologise that you felt that WIZZ let you down on this occasion. We are doing our best to improve our customer experience and would like to learn more about where we fell short this time. We suggest you submit a complaint via the link: https://t.co/goYYi8Y6DI.

@Disgrun32313447 @WizzAirUK_W9 @WizzAirNot Hi! We're truly sorry for the delay. Due to the busy summer season, there may be delays in receiving responses from our customer relations team. However, without exception, all registered claims will be answered as soon as possible. We thank you for your understanding.

data.text: @DPMMiller @eliza_konopko Hi! You can only take a foldable stroller free of charge. If you'd like to take a car seat too then you need to purchase a checked-in bag in your reservation. As for food/water: you can bring as much as needed for the trip. Thank you for the understanding.

data.text: @kirstie_uw If you bought your Wizz Air tickets from a third party, then they are your booking owner and receive the refunds from WIZZ. Please contact them and request a refund from Wizz Air on your behalf. We advise booking directly with us through our website: https://t.co/ZAbxHCCski.
@aneta_doro @WizzAirUK_W9 @Wizz_Air @WizzAirNot Live chat support is available 24/7 in the English language. The Polish line is closed for the weekend.

data.text: @SelametBelkiran Hi Selamet! We're truly sorry that your flight has been cancelled - this is never a decision which is made easily by us. You will be sent your options by Wizz shortly. You can check other available destinations on our website: https://t.co/a4iBwuFHxJ.

@jamesdude11 Hi! We're truly sorry for the delay. Due to the busy summer season, there may be delays in receiving responses from our customer relations team. However, without exception, all registered claims will be answered as soon as possible. We thank you for your understanding.

@vassebrandon1 Hi! We're truly sorry for the delay. Due to the busy summer season, there may be delays in receiving responses from our customer relations team. However, without exception, all registered claims will be answered as soon as possible. We thank you for your understanding.

@xTFAntpclRLeg0d Hi there! Seats depend on type of aircraft.
Have a good day!
@MarionH06763018 Hi! All flights on our website are scheduled to depart. In case of any changes, you will be notified by us at the earliest opportunity. Have a wonderful journey!

@mcarsi1993 Hi Marsi! We're constantly reviewing and updating our schedule to bring our customers to the places they want the most - and sometimes we have to make the challenging decision to suspend routes.

data.text: @R8carF @Bathaksaudi Hi! The mobile boarding card is available for most destinations. If the airport does not support it, then you'll need to print out your boarding card. You can check mobile card availability here: https://t.co/u2lPzQk3B1.

@Ryan27061986 Hi Ryan! The flight change option is available in your WIZZ profile. You need to login in and click on "Make changes" button. You would have to pay a flight change fee and the difference between the fares.

@Lee18281369 @WizzAirUK_W9 Hi there! Our colleagues doing their best to respond all claims, we will reach as soon as possible. 
Have a good day!

data.text: @oliviabarker03 Hi there! Our colleagues make sure to reply in the 30 days timeframe after your last sent email. If you didn't receive any e-mails within this timeframe, please reach via our live chat channel and our colleagues will inform you. https://t.co/th7YMTeRwK

data.text: @phblasen @BUC_Airports Hi there! We apologise that you felt that WIZZ let you down. We are doing our best to improve our customer experience and would like to learn more about where we fell short this time. We suggest you submit a complaint via the link: https://t.co/F1LYZYRxMV

@WmTashan Hi. Due to a busy summer season there may be delays in receiving responses from our customer relations team. However, without exception, all registered claims will be answered and processed as soon as possible. We thank you for your patience and understanding with this.
